name: Tile Titan Toppler - Jam Edition
description:
= = = = =

Tile Titan Toppler is a game where you break your own play area to deal damage! Fight through a unique gauntlet of bosses with crazy bullet patterns, but for what?!

The game is will continue it's development after the jam, please stay tuned for more updates!

= = = = =
CONTROLS
= = = = =
WASD to move
Left Click (and drag) to select/deselect tiles
Right Click to launch your attack
Shift to enter Focus Mode
E to deselect all currently selected tiles

= = = = =
